mapper.sql: ORGAN_NO, SERVICE_ID, TMPBATCH_TB_ID, TMPDATA_TB_ID, FLOW_TB_ID, ECMSERVICE_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into SM_ORGAN_DATA_TB
ORGAN_NO,
SERVICE_ID,
TMPBATCH_TB_ID,
TMPDATA_TB_ID,
FLOW_TB_ID,
ECMSERVICE_ID,
#{organNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{tmpbatchTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{tmpdataTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ecmserviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update SM_ORGAN_DATA_TB
SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TMPBATCH_TB_ID = #{tmpbatchTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TMPDATA_TB_ID = #{tmpdataTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLOW_TB_ID = #{flowTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ECMSERVICE_ID = #{ecmserviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORGAN_NO = #{organNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SM_ORGAN_DATA_TB set SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TMPBATCH_TB_ID = #{tmpbatchTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TMPDATA_TB_ID = #{tmpdataTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLOW_TB_ID = #{flowTbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ECMSERVICE_ID = #{ecmserviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORGAN_NO = #{organNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select from SM_ORGAN_DATA_TB a
AND ORGAN_NO IN (SELECT ORGAN_NO FROM SM_ORGAN_PARENT_TB WHERE PARENT_ORGAN = #{parentOrganNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND ORGAN_NO IN (SELECT ORGAN_NO FROM SM_USER_ORGAN_TB WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND EXISTS (select 1 from sm_organ_tb sot, sm_organ_parent_tb sopt where exists (select 1 from sm_users_tb sut where sut.user_no = #{userNo} and sot.organ_no = sut.organ_no) and sot.organ_no = sopt.parent_organ and sopt.organ_no=a.organ_no ï¼‰
order by organ_no
